items.title: Death toll from North Macedonia nightclub fire rises to 59
items.description: Pyrotechnics during a concert sparked the blaze, causing mass panic in the crowd.

items.title: US deports hundreds of Venezuelans despite court order
items.description: Their arrival comes less than 24 hours after a federal judge blocked a law Trump planned to use for the deportations.

items.title: They had a fairytale American childhood - but was radiation slowly killing them?
items.description: Campaigners in St Louis want support for those who claim to have become ill due to research into the atomic bomb.

items.title: Watch: Fisherman reunites with brother after 95 days lost at sea
items.description: Maximo Napa said he had to resort to eating roaches, birds and turtles to survive.

items.title: Pope Francis says he faces 'period of trial' in health update
items.description: The pontiff has been recovering in hospital from pneumonia, after he was admitted last month.
